fullText: Hadestown is a triumph of musical theater that makes ancient myths feel urgently contemporary, with Anaïs Mitchell's folk-rock score creating a haunting world where love battles against capitalism and despair.
dtliExcerpt: Hadestown is a triumph of musical theater that makes ancient myths feel urgently contemporary, with Anaïs Mitchell's folk-rock score creating a haunting world where love battles against capitalism and despair.
